item.name: Cluster IO Bandwidth
item.description: Cluster wide IO bandwidth in KBps.

item.name: Cluster IOPS
item.description: Cluster wide average IO operations per second.

trigger.name: Nutanix Cluster storage latency is greater than 10 ms for 5 minutes

item.name: Cluster Total Storage Capacity
item.description: Total storage capacity of the cluster in bytes.

item.name: Cluster Used Storage Capacity
item.description: Number of bytes of storage used on the cluster.

item_prototype.name: Container $1 Latency
item_prototype.description: Average IO latency for this container in microseconds.

trigger_prototype.name: Nutanix Container {#SNMPVALUE} latency is greater than 10 ms for 5 minutes

item_prototype.name: Container $1 Free Storage (percent)
item_prototype.description: Free Storage Capacity of the Container

trigger_prototype.name: Free storage is less than 10% on Nutanix Container {#SNMPVALUE}
Free storage is less than 20% on Nutanix Container {#SNMPVALUE}

dependency.name: Free storage is less than 10% on Nutanix Container {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: Container $1 IOPS
item_prototype.description: Number of IO operations served per second from this container.

item_prototype.name: Container $1 Total Storage Capacity
item_prototype.description: Total capacity of the container in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Container $1 Used Storage
item_prototype.description: Number of bytes used in the container.

item_prototype.name: Status of CVM $1
item_prototype.description: Status of the node.

item_prototype.name: Data Status of CVM $1
item_prototype.description: Status of core data services on the Controller VM.

trigger_prototype.name: Nutanix Core Data Service on CVM {#SNMPVALUE} is down

item_prototype.name: MetaData Status of CVM $1
item_prototype.description: Status of metadata services on the Controller VM.

trigger_prototype.name: Nutanix Metadata Service on CVM {#SNMPVALUE} is down

discovery_rule.name: Discovered Disks
discovery_rule.description: A unique index for each row in the disk status table

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Average Latency
item_prototype.description: Average IO latency per micro seconds for the disk

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} ID
item_prototype.description: A unique disk id for each disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} IO Bandwidth
item_prototype.description: IO bandwidth in KBps for the disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} IOPS
item_prototype.description: Number IO per seconds for the disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Bytes Free
item_prototype.description: Total number of bytes availabe to the non-root users on the device through its file system.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Inodes Free
item_prototype.description: Total number of inodes availabe to the non-root users on the device through its file system.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Free Percent
item_prototype.description: Percentage of free space left on physical disk

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Bytes Raw
item_prototype.description: Maximum number of raw bytes available on the device

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Bytes Total
item_prototype.description: Total number of bytes usable on the device through its file system.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} Inodes Total
item_prototype.description: Maximum number of inodes usable on the device through its file system.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#SNMPINDEX} State
item_prototype.description: State of the disk. online 1 offline 2

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Latency
item_prototype.description: Average IO latency per micro seconds of the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} CPU Count
item_prototype.description: Total number of CPU threads present in the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} CPU Usage
item_prototype.description: CPU usage percentage of the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} IO Bandwidth
item_prototype.description: IO bandwidth in KBps of the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Memory Usage
item_prototype.description: Memory usage percentage of the hypervisor."

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Memory
item_prototype.description: Total memory available on the hypervisor in bytes.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} IOPS Read
item_prototype.description: Number of read IO operations served per second on this hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Rx Bytes
item_prototype.description: Total number of bytes recieved on the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Rx Drop Count
item_prototype.description: Total number of packets dropped while receiving on the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Tx Bytes
item_prototype.description: Total number of bytes transmitted from the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} Tx Drop Count
item_prototype.description: Total number of packets dropped while transmiting from hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE}: VMs Count
item_prototype.description: Total number of VM configured on the hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: Hypervisor {#SNMPVALUE} IOPS Write
item_prototype.description: Number of write IO operations served per second on this hypervisor.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Latency
item_prototype.description: Average IO latency per micro seconds of the VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} VM CPU Count
item_prototype.description: Total number of CPUs allocated to the VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} VM CPU Usage
item_prototype.description: CPU usage percentage of the VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} VM Hypervisor ID
item_prototype.description: Hypervisor id on which the VM resides.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} IO Bandwidth
item_prototype.description: IO bandwidth in KBps of the VM

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} VM Memory Usage
item_prototype.description: Memory usage percentage of the VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} VM Memory
item_prototype.description: Total memory available on the VM in bytes.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} VM Power State
item_prototype.description: Power state of the VM

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} IOPS Read
item_prototype.description: Number of Read IO operations served per second on this VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Bytes Received
item_prototype.description: Total number of bytes recieved on the VM

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Droped Bytes Received
item_prototype.description: Total number of packets dropped while receiving on the VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Bytes Transmitted
item_prototype.description: Total number of bytes transmitted from the VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Droped Bytes Transmitted
item_prototype.description: Total number of packets dropped while transmiting from VM.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} IOPS Write
item_prototype.description: Number of Write IO operations served per second on this VM.
